document.full_text: rajon rondo overcame a dislocated left elbow to lead the boston celtics to a 97-81 win over miami on saturday which cut the heat's lead to 2-1 in their eastern conference semi-final.
document.title: rondo injures elbow as boston beat heat
lines_and_colors: rajon rondo overcame a dislocated left elbow to lead the boston celtics to a 97-81 win over miami on saturday which cut the heat's lead to 2-1 in their eastern conference semi-final.
